short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to remind you to add guests on your google calendar meetings. Inspired by us repeatedly forgetting to invite guests...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever forgotten to invite guests to your google calendar invite? 

This is a simple tool that will remind you to invite guests to your events any time you are making a meeting that likely involves multiple people.
